# Logo Assets

Place your logo files in this directory. Supported formats:
- PNG (recommended for transparency)
- SVG (recommended for scalability)
- JPG (for photos)

## Required Files

### For Web App
- `logo.svg` or `logo.png` - Main logo (primary)
- `logo-light.svg` or `logo-light.png` - Light variant (for dark backgrounds)
- `logo-dark.svg` or `logo-dark.png` - Dark variant (for light backgrounds)
- `logo-icon.svg` or `logo-icon.png` - Icon only (square, for favicons)

### Recommended Sizes
- Main logo: 200px height recommended
- Icon: 512x512px (will be resized automatically)

## Current Files
- Using text-based logo (no image files yet)
- Update `branding.config.js` to switch to image logos
